pullrequest.title: New VRC Textures from Thomas and Maurice (redone to fix merges)

content.raw:
I like 'em bricks :] ... i imagined them to be pieces of a brick wall - they actually look nicer on the 2x4 (because it's more or less properly texture mapped) than on the big blocks (where texture size in the material script somehow seems to be ignored) and give more variation than having just one texture for all the 2x4's.
If you have a nice 2nd 2x4 wood texture feel free to replace it. ;)
content.html: I like 'em bricks :] ... i imagined them to be pieces of a brick wall - they actually look nicer on the 2x4 (because it's more or less properly texture mapped) than on the big blocks (where texture size in the material script somehow seems to be ignored) and give more variation than having just one texture for all the 2x4's. If you have a nice 2nd 2x4 wood texture feel free to replace it. ;)
